menu.item-veg-description: Chickpeas boiled with whole spices then cooked in a freshly made spice blend and flavourful onion & tomato based gravy served with 2 parathas + rice + papad + pickled onion + papad
menu.item-nonveg-description: Boneless chicken cooked in aromatic and fragrant spices in yogurt, onion & tomato based gravy served with 2 parathas + rice + achar + papad

menu.item-veg-description: Mushrooms cooked with petals of onion, tomato and capsicum in freshly ground spice mix in a thick onion & tomato based gravy served with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad
menu.item-nonveg-description: Juicy beef chunks cooked in aromatic spices and pepper in fragrant gravy of onion tomato and coconut based gravy served with 2 parathas + achar + papad + side salad

menu.item-veg-description: Lightly roasted paneer tossed in lip smacking onion & tomato based gravy with aromatic fragrant spices and topped with crispy garlic bits and cream served with 2 parathas + rice + papad + achar + side salad
menu.item-nonveg-description: A classic Goan recipe with tangy, spicy flavours in a creamy gravy made of coconut milk and aromatic spices served with rice + achar + papad + side salad

menu.item-veg-description: Assorted vegetables cooked in creamy coconut milk with vinegar and tamarind for zesty tangy flavour served with rice + achar + papad
menu.item-nonveg-description: Bonless chicken pieces marinated in aromatic fragrant spice mix and vingar for a spicy, tancy flavour served with rice + achar + side salad + papad

menu.item-veg-description: Slow cooked aromatic basmati rice and assorted vegetables cooked with fragrant spices and ghee served with mint yogurt dip + achar + papad
menu.item-nonveg-description: A parsi delicacy of aromatic basmati rice and chicken cooked in fresh Iranian spices and cooked with tangy berries for a sweet flavourful and lip smacking taste served with beetroot yogurt

menu.item-veg-description: The most favourite Indo-Chinese dish of stir fired veggies in spicy lip smacking schezwan sauce served with some fried noodles and schezwan sauce
menu.item-nonveg-description: The most favourite Indo-Chinese dish of stir fired chicken & veggies in spicy lip smacking schezwan sauce served with some fried noodles and schezwan sauce

menu.item-veg-description: Soya chunks cooked in onion and tomato based thick gravy with lip smaking spices and flavours served with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar
menu.item-nonveg-description: A Parsi dish with the combination of elements from Parsi and Gujrati community. Chicken, lentils and vegetables cooked together with freshly ground special spice mix served with rice + achar + side salad + papad

menu.item-veg-description: Raw jackfruit cooked to perfection in a caramalised onion, garlic and ginger paste with freshly ground garam masala served with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar
menu.item-nonveg-description: Tender chicken pieces cooked in spicy flavourful lip smacking base of carmalised onion, garlic and chillies with tangy tamrind and yogurt mix topped with fresh corinader served with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

menu.item-veg-description: Baby potatoes roasted in a spice mix and cooked in a base of onion, tomato and yogurt gravy finished off with fresh herbs served with 2 parathas + siide salad + papad + achar
menu.item-nonveg-description: Lamb slow cooked in a thick onion-tomato based gravy with freshly ground spices topped with soft petals of onion and tomato served with 2 parathas + rice + papad + achar

menu.item-veg-description: Assorted mix veggies cooked in a creamy onion, tomato and cashew based thick gravy finished with freshly ground garam masala and herbs served with 2 parathas + rice + papad + side salad + achar
menu.item-nonveg-description: A fiery & spicy dish from the coastal regions of Maharashtra. Mackerel cooked in home made malvani spice mix with onion, tomato and coconut based gravy. Served with rice + side salad + papad + achar

menu.item-veg-description: Indian cottage cheese cooked in a creamy buttery thick gravy of onion, tomato and cashew slow cooked with aromatic basmati rice, fried onion, mint and corriander served with yogurt dip + achar + papad
menu.item-nonveg-description: A hearty, rich rice dish that's a favourite among Indians. Slow cooked chicken marinated in spices, fresh herbs, fried onions and yogurt; layered in rice and cooked on a slow flame to create the perfect dum biryani flavour. Served with yogurt dip + achar + papad.

menu.item-veg-description: Indo-Chinese noodles cooked with assorted veggies and aromatic Indo-Chinese spice mix served with some fried noodles and spicy schezwan dip
menu.item-nonveg-description: Indo-Chinese noodles cooked with assorted veggies, chicken and aromatic Indo-Chinese spice mix served with some fried noodles and spicy schezwan dip
